Evanesco Offline
  • API Reference
  • evanesco
  • evanesco.regex_detect
  • View page source

evanesco.regex_detectÔÉÅ

Deterministic regex-based PII detectors.

This module uses the third-party regex package for robust patterns and returns span dictionaries that are compatible with alignment routines.

Functions

regex_findall(text)

Find PII-like spans using regular expressions.
